name: Ryan Hamilton
bio:
Ryan Hamilton is the co-founder of Slow Rodeo. His background is in creative direction and brand building. He most recently served as the Creative Director for Autograph. Prior to that helped builds brands like Dosist, Visitor and has done creative direction for artists like Kendrick Lamar, Dora Cat, and Ariana Grande.

https://twitter.com/blame_hamilton
https://instagram.com/blamehamilton

https://twitter.com/slow_rodeo
